Key Match Events: Dominic Fletcher knocked a cutter from Kelly down the left-field line for an RBI double
Gavin Sheets slid home to score as Boston Red Sox catcher Connor Wong was unable to tag him
Jacob Amaya made a tremendous diving stop and throw to retire Tyler O’Neill
Zach DeLoach broke it open with a two-run single
Luis Robert Jr. brought home the final run with a sacrifice fly
Post-Match Reflections: Grady Sizemore said, 'That’s just the kind of game we want to play'
Grady Sizemore said, 'We played very clean, took care of the ball, made some great plays, good throws'
Grady Sizemore said, 'I thought (Flexen) did great. Bullpen picked him up, too. That’s what winning baseball looks like.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: Chris Flexen allowed two runs on six hits with six strikeouts and one walk in six innings
Fletcher threw out Jarren Duran at the plate
Fletcher had a diving catch in right field to rob Rafael Devers of a hit in the sixth inning
